last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 5
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bostonian Rick and two of his triplets, Bobby and Drew, play for a chance to win vacation money for their mom, a frontline worker who has worked tirelessly during the pandemic.

name: Small Fortune
overview: American version of the British competition series in which teams of three friends compete in the tiniest of challenges for a chance to win big money. From a shrunk-down Oval Office to a mini Arc de Triomphe, each team must prove their skills on playing fields that have been squeezed down to the size of a dollhouse.

episodes.name: Semper Fly
episodes.overview: Nick, Johnnie and BaoThy are fired up and ready to win it all with their military precision. The trio is playing to help pay off BaoThy's student loans and take a group adventure. They play Waste Wing, One Small Step, Wedding Clashers and more.

episodes.name: Grandma Knows Best
episodes.overview: Three generations of women play to fund a family reunion for Grandma Sylvia, who lives in Tennessee and hasn't seen her family together in years. This feisty grandma calls it like it is in her attempt to break the bank and steal the prize.

episodes.name: Team U.S.A
episodes.overview: Gold medal-winning Team USA Softball Champions Amanda, Lovie and Leah say their greatest accomplishment is being proud mothers. They bring their competitive spirit to our tiny games, including French Roll, Toadally Hammered, One Small Step, and the Big Little Heist.

episodes.name: For Better or Nurse
episodes.overview: First responders Rose and Simeon and Godfather to their child Aaron serve on the front lines with nerves of steel, but can they handle the pressure of tiny games? If the trio wins big, they plan to donate Monday to Roseâ€™s home country, Haiti, for disaster relief. Watch to see if they will conquer Pink power, A Merry Little Christmas, Fork it over, and The Big Little Heist.
